text: The scale factor provides information about how side lengths, perimeters and areas of the figures are related. It

• Is the ratio of an image side length to the corresponding side length of the original.
  • is the multiplier that connects the original length to the image length.
  • tells us how one length grows or shrinks by a certain factor.
In Problem 3.2, we use scale drawings to make similar shapes given a set of constraints (criteria).
